Serge didn't move an inch through the sword slashes, but suddenly slash mar=
ks appear all over him and mech fluid pours out. Serge struggles to his fee=
t but falls over again. (No hands) He could not be defeated by these small =
wimps, it wasn't possible. Perplex lifted his hand and aimed towards the gr=
ound. Serge looked back and forth between Red Bolt and Perplex.

Serge: Why=
 must both you fight me, have no honor in you?

Serge was dizzy and disorie=
nted, and couldn't talk straight. He never talked much in the first place..=
.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RickEKildahl@... 
  To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, January 14, 2001 3:23 PM
  Subject: Re: Bat=
tle in Neutral base


  Red Bolt watches the missle fly into the distance, =
closes the distance 
  between them considerably, then begins slashing the =
swords wildly at Serge. 
        eGroups Sponsor
